backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing message storage, admin CRUD for messages, and user profile management with access control.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script converting old list-based messages into a map with IDs for the updated backend format.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping recent admin and i18n features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of all frontend files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH theme tokens for light and dark modes with global styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with the I18n provider and AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24Car: Reusable card wrapper component with hover animation and optional click handling.
frontend/src/components/common/Work24For: Reusable form field component handling label, helper text, and error display.
frontend/src/components/contact/ContactV: Dialog component allowing users to submit contact requests for workers with validation and backend submission.
frontend/src/components/contact/Work24Of: Dialog component showing official phone and email contacts using i18n and a close button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppFooter: Footer with contact info, service description, quick links, and branding using i18n.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Responsive header with navigation, logo, admin-aware links, and language switcher.
Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and page content.
frontend/src/components/materials/Materi: Card displaying sanitized material info with image, details, and a contact button.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Dropdown language selector updating the i18n context.
frontend/src/components/workers/WorkerCa: Card showing sanitized worker data, gallery dialog previews, and a contact button.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing an authenticated or anonymous backend actor with reactivity.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, state, and persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React-query hooks for fetching and deleting admin messages using the actor API.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: i18n provider managing language state, translations, and HTML lang attribute.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and a nested object containing all UI translation strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind layers and theme variables for light and dark modes with global base styles.
frontend/src/lib/adminAllowlist.ts: Deprecated helper for admin allowlist checks, replaced by session-based authentication.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Manages admin login state using sessionStorage, including storing, retrieving, and clearing credentials.
frontend/src/lib/contactSubmissions.ts: Provides a React Query mutation for sending contact submissions through the actor and invalidating admin message queries.
frontend/src/lib/formatIcTime.ts: Converts IC nanosecond timestamps into human‑readable locale strings.
frontend/src/lib/localPreferences.ts: Handles onboarding, username, and language preferences via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/materialsStorage.ts: Manages material entries in localStorage, including retrieval and creation with generated IDs.
frontend/src/lib/officialContact.ts: Exports official Work24 phone and email constants and corresponding clickable links.
Sanitizes worker and material objects by whitelisting allowed fields to prevent exposure of sensitive data.
frontend/src/lib/servicesCatalog.ts: Defines the list of service categories with IDs, translation keys, and icons, plus a lookup helper.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Provides simple required-field and mobile-number validators using translation keys for errors.
frontend/src/lib/workersStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves worker records in localStorage, including adding workers with generated IDs and filtering by service.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, wraps the app with Internet Identity and React Query providers, and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Admin.tsx: Implements the admin login and message-management UI with credential checks, deletion dialogs, and data fetching.
frontend/src/pages/Architect.tsx: Implements the architect contact form with validation, file handling, and submission through the contact API.
frontend/src/pages/Career.tsx: Career form page collecting applicant details and submitting them via contact API with validation and success/error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/ContactUs.tsx: Displays official phone, email, and service info with icons and localized text.
frontend/src/pages/HomeServices.tsx: Home page showing hero content and a grid of service cards that navigate to service detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/Materials.tsx: Lists available materials or a fallback message and provides a contact panel for inquiries.
frontend/src/pages/Onboarding.tsx: User onboarding flow collecting name and language, saving preferences, and redirecting home.
frontend/src/pages/SellerMaterialSubmiss: Form for sellers to submit materials with validation, image uploads, and storage via addMaterial.
frontend/src/pages/ServiceDetail.tsx: Shows service info and workers for a given service, with a dialog to contact a selected worker.
frontend/src/pages/WorkerSubmission.tsx: Worker signup form to upload profile and work images and create a worker entry with validation.
frontend/src/types/materials.ts: Defines the Material interface including id, metadata, and images.
frontend/src/types/workers.ts: Defines the Worker interface including id, skill, service category, and images.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, storing them in sessionStorage, and syncing URL and session values, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom colors, extended theme settings, animations, and several plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including existing features, new feature requests, and metadata for the Work24 Admin Dashboard.
